definition: variant of 克[ke4]/to subdue/to overthrow/to restrain
Ke (c. 2000 BC), seventh of the legendary Flame Emperors, 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God
abbr. for 克羅地亞|克罗地亚[Ke4 luo2 di4 ya4], Croatia/(Tw) abbr. for 克羅埃西亞|克罗埃西亚[Ke4 luo2 ai1 xi1 ya4], Croatia
to toil/labor/laborer/to put sb to trouble (of doing sth)/meritorious deed/to console (Taiwan pr. [lao4] for this sense)
Slovakia/Slovak/abbr. for 斯洛伐克[Si1 luo4 fa2 ke4]

sentences.english: According to Krauss, "Insanity is a dream in which the senses are awake."
sentences.chinese: 克劳斯认为，“精神错乱则是感官清醒时的梦。”

sentences.english: The little Klaus opened the cover of the box and took out the priest.
sentences.chinese: 小克劳斯打开箱盖，把牧师放了出来。

sentences.english: Crouse is 72 and receives Social Security but said that was not enough to live on.
sentences.chinese: 克劳斯先生72岁，享受社会保障，但他说不够生活。

sentences.english: It was the hardest fight of Kraus's life.
sentences.chinese: 这是克劳斯生命里最艰苦的战役。

sentences.english: The little Klaus felt sad and removed the horse's skin.
sentences.chinese: 小克劳斯感到很伤心，把马的皮剥了下来。

sentences.english: It was soon Uppercross with him almost every day.
sentences.chinese: 过了不久，他几乎天天跑到厄泼克劳斯。

sentences.english: So now Kraus held the gun against his head.
sentences.chinese: 于是，克劳斯拿起枪对准了自己的脑袋。

sentences.english: This paper researches Claus sulfur-made process by use of the minimum free energy method.
sentences.chinese: 本文用最小自由能法研究了克劳斯法制硫过程。
克劳斯津津有味地体验着世人的关注。

sentences.english: Can't you drive any faster Klaus?!
sentences.chinese: 你就不能再开快一点儿吗，克劳斯？

sentences.english: TU Clausthal hopes to stay in contact with former students or researchers (i. e. alumni) from China.
sentences.chinese: 克劳斯塔尔工业大学希望与中国校友们保持密切联系。

sentences.english: A poll showed 65 percent of Czechs backed Klaus on the issue.
sentences.chinese: 民调显示，65%的捷克人支持克劳斯的立场。

sentences.english: He accused Klaus of leading a regime of "gangster capitalism".
sentences.chinese: 他指责克劳斯领导的政权制度是“混账资本主义”。

sentences.english: But Klaus Baer also said, the good students will make something happen. [ECU]
sentences.chinese: 克劳斯也说过，优秀的学生还是会做出一番成就的。

sentences.english: The key involves the relativistic effect of time, Krauss explains.
sentences.chinese: 克劳斯解释说，关键在于时间的相对性所产生的影响。

sentences.english: Krausgarnter said he saw police "standing on the bridge and doing nothing".
sentences.chinese: 克劳斯加德纳说他看见警察“站在桥上什么也没做”。

definition: Hofmann or Hoffman (name)/August Wilhelm von Hofmann (1818-1892), German chemist/Dustin Hoffman (1937-), US film actor
